channel.title: Comments on: How to update your iPhone to iOS 6.0 UPDATED – 10:58 PM EDT
channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: By: Ray Hollister
item.dc:creator: Ray Hollister
item.description: Make sure to backup your iPhone to your computer first. Follow the directions in the link on the article to back up your iPhone with iTunes on your computer. Also, if you normally sync it with iTunes, make sure to plug it in and sync it up before you run the update too. As long as you do that before you run the update, you shouldn't lose your contacts.
item.content:encoded: Make sure to backup your iPhone to your computer first. Follow the directions in the link on the article to back up your iPhone with iTunes on your computer. Also, if you normally sync it with iTunes, make sure to plug it in and sync it up before you run the update too. As long as you do that before you run the update, you shouldn’t lose your contacts.

item.title: By: Danni B
item.dc:creator: Danni B
item.description: What if I have an Iphone 3G???? i don't have icloud to back up my contacts.... willl everything be deleted?
item.content:encoded: What if I have an Iphone 3G???? i don’t have icloud to back up my contacts…. willl everything be deleted?
